sen.j: 中村 源左衞門（なかむら げんざえもん）は、歌舞伎の名跡の一つ。
sen.e: Genzaemon NAKAMURA is one of stage names for kabuki actors.
Genzaemon NAKAMURA is the stage name of kabuki actors.
Genzaemon NAKAMURA is the stage name of kabuki actors.

sen.j: - 初代中村歌右衛門_(初代)の師匠。
sen.e: He was a tutor for Utaemon NAKAMURA the first.
He was a tutor of Utaemon NAKAMURA the first.
He was a tutor of Utaemon NAKAMURA the first.

sen.j: - 五代目中村山左衛門・四代目中村助五郎に同じ。
sen.e: He was also known as Sanzaemon NAKAMURA the fifth and Sukegoro NAKAMURA.
He was also known as Sanzaemon NAKAMURA the fifth and Sukegoro NAKAMURA.
He was also known as Sanzaemon NAKAMURA the fifth and Sukegoro NAKAMURA.
